introduction.title: About This Application
introduction.description: Enjoy conversations with 3D characters using microphone, text input, and voice synthesis in your web browser. You can change characters (VRM), set personalities, and adjust voice.

techIntro.title: Technology Introduction
techIntro.description: For 3D model display and control, we use
techIntro.githubDesc: This demo's source code is publicly available on GitHub. Feel free to modify and experiment!

usageNotes.title: Usage Notes
usageNotes.description: Please do not intentionally induce discriminatory or violent remarks, or remarks that demean specific individuals. When replacing characters using VRM models, please follow the model's usage terms.

openaiApiKey.title: GLM API Key
openaiApiKey.getFrom: You can get API key from
openaiApiKey.enterKey: Enter the obtained API key in the form.
openaiApiKey.directAccess: GLM API is accessed directly from the browser. Also, API keys and conversation content are not stored on servers.
openaiApiKey.modelNote: Note: The model in use is GLM-4.

dashscopeApiKey.title: Alibaba Cloud TTS API Key (Optional)
dashscopeApiKey.placeholder: Enter Alibaba Cloud TTS API key
dashscopeApiKey.getFrom: You can get API key from
dashscopeApiKey.enterKey: Enter the obtained API key in the form.
dashscopeApiKey.description: Alibaba Cloud TTS provides higher quality voice synthesis service. If not provided, the built-in Web Speech API will be used.
dashscopeApiKey.optional: (Optional) If left blank, the free Web Speech API will be used.

openaiApiKey.title: GLM API Key
openaiApiKey.getFrom: You can get API key from
openaiApiKey.enterKey: Enter the obtained API key in the form.
openaiApiKey.directAccess: GLM API is accessed directly from the browser. Also, API keys and conversation content are not stored on servers.
openaiApiKey.modelNote: Note: The model in use is GLM-4.5-Air.

dashscopeApiKey.title: Alibaba Cloud TTS API Key (Optional)
dashscopeApiKey.placeholder: Enter Alibaba Cloud TTS API key
dashscopeApiKey.getFrom: You can get API key from
dashscopeApiKey.enterKey: Enter the obtained API key in the form.
dashscopeApiKey.description: Alibaba Cloud TTS provides higher quality voice synthesis service. If not provided, the built-in Web Speech API will be used.
dashscopeApiKey.optional: (Optional) If left blank, the free Web Speech API will be used.

ttsModel.title: TTS Model (Optional)
ttsModel.placeholder: Leave blank to use default model qwen3-tts-flash-2025-11-27
ttsModel.description: Specify the TTS model to use. If left blank, the default model qwen3-tts-flash-2025-11-27 will be used.

messageInput.placeholder: Enter what you want to ask
